author: Adam Forrest, Adam Forrest
title: US calls on China to ban wildlife markets, as top Trump official accuses Beijing of 'cover up'
description: Secretary of state Mike Pompeo claims Beijing concealed 'how dangerous the disease is' and failed to report outbreak quickly enough
content:
The US government has called on China to permanently close its wildlife markets, with secretary of state Mike Pompeo citing links between the markets and zoonotic diseases.
The top Trump administration official also claimed Beijing had covered up how dangero… [+3081 chars]
